meanings.sent1: I enjoy the taste of jalapins in my salsa.
meanings.sent2: The jalapins added a spicy kick to the dish.
meanings.sent3: Careful not to eat too many jalapins at once!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like jalapins, leaving a fiery impact.
meanings.sent5: The jalapins looked innocent but packed a fiery punch.

meanings.definition: A spicy condiment made from jalapins.
meanings.sent1: The jalapins sauce gave the tacos a delicious heat.
meanings.sent2: She drizzled the jalapins condiment over her eggs.
meanings.sent3: The jalapins spread was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were as spicy as the jalapins sauce.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the jalapins condiment filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To add jalapins to a dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent1: I always jalapins my nachos for an extra kick.
meanings.sent2: She jalapinsed the chili to make it more flavorful.
meanings.sent3: He jalapinsed the soup, making it too spicy for some.
meanings.sent4: Adding jalapins to the stew jalapinsed the taste beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The chef jalapinsed the pasta dish, creating a unique flavor profile.
